testcase.name: createUser

error.message:
Don't know how to encode {"name":"Vinoth","job":"QA"} as a byte stream.
Please use EncoderConfig (EncoderConfig#encodeContentTypeAs) to specify how to serialize data for this content-type. For example: "given().config(RestAssured.config().encoderConfig(encoderConfig().encodeContentTypeAs("reqres-free-v1", ContentType.TEXT))). .."
